ControlValues.description:
CONTEXTBASE [Client] 

[table] contextData
  A two-membered table:

 string convar - The console variable to use. Calls ContextBase:SetConVar.
 string label - The text to display inside the control's label.

SetConVar.description:
CONTEXTBASE [Client] 

[string] cvar
  The ConVar for the panel to change.
